casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Isaac Jackson STROUD. No. 162P95-6. Supreme Court of North Carolina. Jan. 28, 2016. Derrick Mertz, Special Deputy Attorney General, for State of NC. Isaac Jackson Stroud, Lillington, for Stroud, Isaac Jackson. Roger A. Echols, District Attorney, for State of NC.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 30th of December 2015 by Defendant for Petition for a Redetermination of its Order:

"Motion Dismissed by order of the Court in conference, this the 28th of January 2016."
